author: @wion
title: A new first-of-its-kind mosque in Bangladesh opens doors for 'Hijra' community - South Asia News
text: A new first-of-its-kind mosque in Bangladesh opens doors for 'Hijra' community Story highlights For many transgender individuals, the mosque is now a symbol of a newfound sense of belonging. A 42-year-old Sonia said, "I never dreamt I could pray at a mosque again in my lifetime." Bangladesh in 2013 took a step towards recognising the rights of its transgender women, also referred to as Hijra, by acknowledging them as a third gender. This decision was an important one in the struggle for equality and acceptance for the community in the country. And now, the South Asian country has opened a mosque specifically for members of the Hijra community near Mymensingh, located north of the capital Dhaka in Bangladesh. This comes amid challenges faced by the community in Bangladesh, like in many other Muslim-majority societies, because Hijras challenge traditional binary understandings of gender which leads to social stigma. Led by the 28-year-old community leader, Joyita Tonu, the opening ceremony reportedly spoke on the importance of providing a space free from discrimination. "From now on, no one can deny a hijra from praying in our mosque," Tonu said while adding, "No one can mock us." For many transgender individuals, the mosque is now a symbol of a newfound sense of belonging. A 42-year-old Sonia said, "I never dreamt I could pray at a mosque again in my lifetime." Founder of a hijra charity Mufti Abdur Rahman Azad told AFP that the new mosque has the status as the first-of-its-kind in the country. Notably, interpretations of Islamic religious texts by some hardliners view transgender identities as incompatible with Islamic teachings and this in turn leads to rejection and discrimination within the Muslim communities. The 65-year-old mosque's imam, Abdul Motaleb, pointed out that the teachings of Islam embrace the community. "They are like any other people created by Allah," he affirmed. Watch | [Pakistan: China firm suspend power project after five engineers killed in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa attack](https://www.wionews.com/videos/pakistan-china-firm-suspend-power-project-after-five-engineers-killed-in-khyber-pakhtunkhwa-attack-704829) "We all are human beings. Maybe some are men, some are women, but all are human. Allah revealed the Holy Koran for all, so everyone has the right to pray, no one can be denied," the imam told AFP. (With inputs from agencies)

author: /cronologia/-/meta/dpa-bang-showbiz
title: Joven actor de la serie “Young Sheldon” disfruta ser padre
text: [Actor](/cronologia/-/meta/actor) A Montana Jordan le encanta ser padre. Hablando exclusivamente con la revista People en un evento de comedia, la estrella de la serie “Young Sheldon”, de 21 años, habló sobre lo mucho que disfruta de la paternidad después de darle la bienvenida a una niña llamada Emma Rae Jordan con su novia Jenna Weeks en mayo pasado “Ha sido genial para mí, hombre. No hay nada mejor”, aseguró Jordan, quien interpretó a Georgie Cooper en la popular serie que llegó a su fin hace cuatro meses. “Ahora mi niña tiene 4 meses y tengo dos sobrinas pequeñas, una sobrina de cinco años y una sobrina de dos años. He estado rodeada de niños y siempre los he amado, pero a ellas debo devolverles, mientras que a mi hija no. Estoy atrapado con ella”, bromea. “Ella es genial, hombre. No hay nada mejor que ser padre. No hay nada mejor, seguro”, añadió. En cuanto a lo que le ha enseñado su nueva incorporación desde que llegó, Jordan añade: “A tener paciencia. Ser paciente. Sí.” El otro mes, el actor y su compañera Emily Osment estrenarán el spin-off de “Young Sheldon”, una serie basada en la pareja que se llama “Georgie and Mandy’s First Marriage”. En Estados Unidos, la serie se estrena el 17 de octubre en CBS. Los suscriptores de Paramount+ podrán ver el episodio al día siguiente a la carta. Con respecto al estreno en España y Latinoamérica, todavía se desconoce la fecha de emisión o plataforma de lanzamiento.

author: Triparna Baishnab
title: Ethereum Turns 10: Price Nears $4K with Global Celebration
text:
Ethereum 10th anniversary was in July 30, 2025. The events were cross-city and involved livestreams, meet-ups, and special panels. Vitalik Buterin and Joseph Lubin entered the international flow. There was a free NFT mint and attracted mega-interest. The token was minted by thousands, which is one of the milestones of Ethereum as well.
Price Boom and Investigation by Institutes The price of Ether got near the mark of 4,000 dollars in the span of the anniversary week. The institutional investment went up and this gave confidence to the market. The analysts predict that the expansion will keep on into Q4 2025. This movement is evidence of its belief in its product, blockchain dominance in the long term.
The Ethereum foundation posted a humorous meme, which said, believe in somETHing. It made allusion to Moo Deng, a meme of a viral pygmy hippo. The community is a combination of humor, culture, and blockchain difference-maker. Meme campaigns generate interest and aid in generating engagement throughout significant occasions. Ethereum is successful with this combination of innovation and technology.
Decentralization and Reliability In ten years, Ethereum has had 100 percent uptime. The centralization is central to the use of Ethereum and its trust in the world. The 10 year anniversary of ethereum was on July 30, 2025. Vitalik Buterin and Joseph Lubin came to the world flow. The minting was free and represented a great event that attracted tremendous excitement.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->market and exchange
Economy, Business and Finance->financial and economic news

author: Erika Dee
title: Taylor Swift, Travis Kelce Families Practically In-Laws Now: 'Supportive Dynamic All Around'
text: The families of Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are apparently overjoyed for the couple as their relationship becomes more committed. One could say they're practically in-laws now, seeing how intertwined their lives have became. The couple's families " [are both on board](https://pagesix.com/2024/01/04/celebrity-news/travis-kelce-and-taylor-swifts-families-have-never-seen-them-so-happy-report/)" with their affair, according to an insider who spoke with Entertainment Tonight on Thursday. "Everyone on Travis' side loves Taylor and vice versa." "Everyone is in a supportive dynamic," the person said. "Their loved ones hope and believe that it will continue because they have never seen either of them so happy." The 34-year-old Swift and Kelce began dating throughout the summer, and in September, when the "Cruel Summer" singer went to her first Kansas City Chiefs game, they made their relationship public. She has now established herself as a bit of a fixture in the stands, frequently supporting him on the tight end with his parents, Ed and Donna Kelce. READ ALSO: [Travis Kelce's Popularity Amid Taylor Swift Romance Is Alarming: Why Managers Want To Reduce His Spotlight](https://www.musictimes.com/articles/99265/20240102/travis-kelces-popularity-amid-taylor-swift-romance-alarming-why-managers.htm) The 12-time Grammy winner really went to the game on Christmas Day with her brother, Austin Swift, and parents, Scott and Andrea Swift, and they were spotted chatting with Ed. Due to Taylor's tour schedule, they had to work remotely when they first started dating, but since she took a break in November, they have spent a lot of time together. The Chiefs star and the singer of "Anti-Hero" are "closer than ever before and everyone around them can see that they're an amazing match," the insider claims. The source said, "They cherish the small things in life and love being together no matter what they're doing." "As a couple, they strive to live as normal lives as they can, and they're enjoying the upswing and development in their relationship." They said, "They think this is their time and that timing is everything." Swift herself spoke [in a December interview with Time](https://www.elle.com/culture/celebrities/a46051779/taylor-swift-first-travis-kelce-romance-interview-joe-alwyn-years/) about her comfort in being more public with Kelce. "When you say a relationship is public, that means I'm going to see him do what he loves, we're showing up for each other, other people are there and we don't care," she said. "The opposite of that is you have to go to an extreme amount of effort to make sure no one knows that you're seeing someone. And we're just proud of each other." After dating for six years, Swift and her last long-term partner, Joe Alwyn, called it quits in March. Before starting a private relationship with Kelce in July, Swift had a brief relationship with musician Matty Healy in May and June. At his Kansas City Chiefs game against the Chicago Bears in late September, they made their relationship public, and since then, their romance has been on the fast track. "We actually had a significant amount of time [dating privately] that no one knew, which I'm grateful for, because we got to get to know each other," Swift told Time. "By the time I went to that first game, we were a couple. I think some people think that they saw our first date at that game? We would never be psychotic enough to hard launch a first date." ALSO READ: [Taylor Swift's Smudged Lipstick Sparks Discussion Among Swifties](https://www.musictimes.com/articles/99278/20240103/taylor-swifts-smudged-lipstick-sparks-discussion-among-swifties.htm)

author: Nebuchanezzar
title: #73 Clínicas abortistas de Madrid y Barcelona amanecen con pintadas de "mata niños" y "asesinos"
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#1](c1#c-1) Privilegios heredados del franquismo y refrendados por el PP y PSOE desde el 78, con esa mayoría es imposible cambiar nada al respecto. Ojalá algún día el PSOE vuelva a ser un partido de izquierdas, republicano y laico.
[#11](c11#c-11) No descartéis la opción de que la gente deje de votar al PSOE para votar a partidos de izquierdas.
[#9](c9#c-9) Cuando eso pase, se pueden olvidar de volver a ganar unas elecciones. Se habla mucho de la culpa del PSOE en esto de la iglesia, pues no, la culpa es de sus votantes y sus líderes lo saben. Si hubiese una gran mayoría declarada de votantes anti privilegios de la iglesia, mañana mismo Pdr sacaba una ley.
[#19](c19#c-19) argumento d cardenales y obispos, prefieren a ateos antes que a tibios. Por algo será.
Do you me entiendes?
[#29](c29#c-29) también hay bebidas blancas que no son leche. Pero la estadística está ahí, la gran mayoría de los actos y propaganda contra clínicas abortistas son de organizaciones católicas. Tipo Hazte oír o abogados cristianos.
[#1](c1#c-1) Yo soy ateo y el aborto lo veo ético en limitados casos, por ejemplo que peligre la vida de la madre, violaciones, malformaciones del feto y similares
Aunque tampoco es que esté a favor de esas pintadas
[#1](c1#c-1) Muy sencillo, esas clínicas ponen un letrero que son israelíes y que están abortando niños palestinos, y los de la Iglesia le hacen la ola:
"Estamos buscando bebés pero ya no quedan" [#2](c2#c-2) hay una sutil diferencia:
- en todas las iglesias no se follan a niños porque no todos los curas son iguales, del mismo modo que no todos los hombres son violadores solo por ser hombres.
- en todas las clinicas de aborto se practican abortos, del mismo modo que en todas las tiendas de juguetes se venden juguetes.
Esto quiere decir que en el caso de las pintadas a tiendas de juguetes siempre tendrían razón al pintarles pinta-juguetes, aunque esté feo pintar y en tus supuestas pintadas no tendrías razon en muchos casos.
[#13](c13#c-13) Siguiendo con las sutilezas:
- "mata niños"es erróneo porque los embriones no son niños.
- "asesinos" es erróneo porque el embrión no es una persona.
[#15](c15#c-15) buena sutileza manida la de deshumanizar. A ver, ¿cuando comienza algo a ser persona? Y ser humano? Solo respetas las vidas de las personas o tambien la de los seres humanos?
[#56](c56#c-56) por lo mismo que un niño no es un adulto.
Podrías haber elegido un mejor simil para aclarar, pero has oscurecido el tema, excepto si quien lo lee ya esta de acuerdo contigo y lo interpreta de cualquier forma. En tal caso, no sé para qué te diriges a mi mensaje.
[#13](c13#c-13) "Encubridores de pederastas", "Hipócritas", "Vividores", "Cínicos" es pintable en todas las iglesias.
[#13](c13#c-13) Permíteme que corrija el primer punto.
Tal vez no se abusa de niños en todas las iglesias al mismo tiempo. Que ahora no se abuse de niños en la iglesia de mi barrio no significa que no se hiciera hace tiempo.
La totalidad de las iglesias, conventos, monasterios, etc, católicos han sido testigos en algún momento del pasado de algún tipo de abuso sobre menores, robo de bebes, connivencia con asesinos fascistas y cuantos crímenes ha cometido la iglesia católica a lo largo de su oscura historia.
Claro que hubo y hay curas que no lo hacen. Pero un gano de arena no hace desierto...
Lo siento, no puedo con esto.
Me cago en dios, en la virgen y me sobra mierda para cagarme en la puta madre de estos fanáticos hijos de puta.
[#27](c27#c-27) mistico2 es como tú. Se pone en el papel de ignorado sin estarlo. Ahora te ha superado, se hace el indignado y me ignora a mi por un ignore inventado. Sois tela de graciosinfantiles. Y, por supuesto, mitad ridiculos y mitad secta.
Besis y Feliz Navidad!!!
En sus medios, están generando discursos para justificarse (hasta al papa se lo ve como satánico). Se preparan complejos argumentarios en los que los derechos y libertades existen gracias a ellos y ellos son los perseguidos y martirizados (el cristianismo más que "ellos"). Así que haya cristianos asesinados en alguna nación, que se retiren crucifijos de centros estatales, que se les frene cuando quieren evitar abortos o imponer su ideología a todo el mundo (dicen que no es ideología sino "un mensaje" jeje) lo consideran persecución contra ellos igual de equiparable todo, y cada vez piden más acciones y organizarse más por una especie de cruzada que han de realizarpor ejemplo
Por un momento, he visto enlazada esta noticia, con la que precede..... malos tiempos
"Estamos buscando bebés pero ya no quedan"
No hay tantas clínicas de ese tipo. Hemos aprobado una ley a nivel de toda España solo para solucionar ese problema, y sin embargo sigue apareciendo recurrentemente en las noticias. ¿Es posible que algo no se haya hecho bien?
Bueno aprovecho para cagarme en la virgen y en todos sus dioses imaginarios después de esto no creo que ofendan sus sentimientos religiosos ficticios
"Mata niños" y "asesinos"... Ahora solo falta añadir un "Palestina Libre" y ya irán las autoridades a dejar el muro como un cristal.
[#45](c45#c-45) Es que ellos son los primeros en saltarse las normas de su propia religión. Luego un tío vestido de negro dentro de un cajón de madera les dice que les perdonan sus pecados, y a otra cosa, mariposa...

author: Jesus Reyes
title: Person of interest wanted in Mecca teen’s murder
text: Person of interest wanted in Mecca teen’s murder The Riverside County Sheriff's Office released information on a person of interest wanted in connection with the investigation into the murder of a 17-year-old earlier this year in Mecca. The murder was reported just after midnight on March 25, 2024, on the 71000 block of Miramar Drive. Deputies arrived and found evidence of a shooting nearby but initially did not find a victim or suspect. Deputies eventually found, Francisco Ramirez, 17, was found dead in the area of Sea View Way and 72nd Avenue, a little over half a mile away from where the shooting was reported. The investigation has remained ongoing for three months. On Thursday, authorities announced that David Espinoza, 20, of Mecca is a person of interest in the teen's death. Espinoza’s whereabouts are currently unknown, authorities said. Espinoza is described as a Hispanic male, standing 5 foot, 4 inches tall, weighing 135 pounds, with black hair and brown eyes. He is wanted on an outstanding felony warrant for an unrelated robbery and assault with a deadly weapon investigation. The Riverside County Sheriff’s Office is seeking the public’s help with locating David Espinoza. Anyone with information about this investigation or Espinoza’s whereabouts is encouraged to contact Riverside Sheriff’s Central Homicide Unit Investigators R. Deanne or K Farag at 951–955–2777. Anyone who sees Espinoza or knows his immediate whereabouts should call 9–1–1.
